cab.content: 5$.....CAB/Vv^fflffl j^qATTLK SITUATION - NOOK - 11th JULY, 1918.Wo improved our positions slightly during the night East of VILLERS BRETONNEUX,-and carried out successful raids in the neighbourhood of MERRIS and FBSTUBISRT, whioh gave us several prisoners. Hostile artillery has shown some activity against our positions astride the SOrUuS.On the French front the situation is unchanged. Considerable movement has been observed North-west of CORNI LIST (10 miles East Of RHEIMS).2, ITAHAN FRONT.The situation la unchanged.jieral Staff,War Office, S.W.1,11th July, 1918. ued at 12,40 p.m*For the personal information --of the Minister only. - SECRET .
